parameters.content:
## LLM Usages

Google Gemini LLM is being utilized for the structured data extraction handling.

## Note

Deals with the Google Maps data extraction by utilizing the Bright Data and Google Gemini LLM for transforming the profile into a structured JSON response.

**Please make sure to set the input fields node with the filtering criteria, Bright Data zone name, Webhook notification URL**

nodes.name: Create a binary data for Structured Data Extract
Write the structured content to disk
Initiate a Webhook Notification for Structured Data
Update Google Sheets for Structured Data
Google Gemini Chat Model for Google Search
Structured Output Parser for Google Search

parameters.content:
## Disclaimer
This template is only available on n8n self-hosted as it's making use of the community node for MCP Client.

nodes.name: Create a binary data for Structured Data Extract for Yelp
Write the Yelp content to disk

parameters.content: ## Data Enrichment with Yelp data extraction

## Step 1 : Set the Input Fields

url : https://www.google.com/maps/search/
webhook notification url: https://webhook.site/c9118da2-1c54-460f-a83a-e5131b7098db
search : dentists+in+texas/?q=dentists+in+texas
zone : serp_api1
start : 0
num : 20

## Step 2 : Set the Credentials

Set the credentials for 

1. Bright Data
2. Google Gemini

## Step 3 : Configure or Set the Output Nodes

1. Disk location to persist
2. Google Sheet

output.desc: TEXAS CITY DENTAL - Updated May 2025 - 18 Photos Yelp

output.name: Texas City Dental - Dentist in Texas City
6 to 9 Dental Texas

output.name: Central Texas Family Dental
output.address: 4104 E Stan Schlueter Loop #4, Killeen, TX 76542

output.name: Texas Kids Dental Care
output.address: 3650 Joe Battle Blvd, El Paso, TX 79938

output.name: Texas Dental Specialists - Dr. Omar Yousuf
output.address: 5940 W Parker Rd STE 103, Plano, TX 75093
